story_parts.text: A lion goes to Disney World. He is very excited to see all of the rides and the characters. He goes on all of the rides and meets all of the characters. He has a great time and doesn't want to leave.

next_options.0: The lion gets tired and decides to go home

story_parts.text: The lion walks back to his home in Africa. He is very happy with his experience at Disney World and can't wait to come back again. He tells all of his friends about the rides and the characters he met. They are all very excited to go to Disney World too.
